title: Wells Fargo's Heather Hunt-Ruddy on Making Good Advisors Great
description: The best athletes in the world have coaches, and the top advisors should as well, says Wells' head of wealth management business development.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: The best athletes in the world have coaches, and the top advisors should as well, says Wells' head of wealth management business development.
